data.text:
Aero Synergie Sky Ranger

â¬ 34 999

Description

For Sale: High Performance Airplane Are you ready to take flight in the skies with an exceptional aircraft? Look no further! I am selling a remarkable airplane that is guaranteed to provide you with an outstanding flying experience. This aircraft is equipped with top-of-the-line features and has been meticulously maintained for optimal performance and safety. First and foremost, this airplane comes with a variety of essential instruments to ensure a smooth and comfortable flight. It boasts a variometer, an airspeed indicator, a tachometer, and temperature gauges for both oil and water. Additionally, it is equipped with an oil and water cooler system, as well as an oil pressure gauge and a voltmeter. With these instruments, you can be confident in monitoring the aircraft's performance in real-time. To enhance your flying pleasure, this airplane is fitted with spacious fuel tanks with a capacity of 60 liters. This ensures that you can embark on long journeys without worrying about frequent refueling stops. Furthermore, the aircraft is equipped with a high-quality DUC tripale inconel propeller, which not only ensures exceptional performance but also reduces noise levels for a more enjoyable flight. In terms of design, this airplane does not disappoint. It features sleek and aerodynamic wheel fairings, enhancing both the performance and the overall look of the aircraft. The wings have a span of 8.50 meters and are finished in a stylish and eye-catching salmon color. The vertical stabilizers boast a striking NINJA design, adding an extra touch of uniqueness to this exceptional aircraft. Safety is of utmost importance, and that's why this airplane is equipped with the latest radio and transponder technology. It comes with a FILSER ATR 833S radio and a FILSER TAT 800 mode S transponder, ensuring clear and effective communication with air traffic control. Additionally, this aircraft is fitted with a BRS-6 parachute system, providing an added layer of security in case of emergencies. The inclusion of this feature demonstrates a commitment to safety and is ideal for peace of mind during your flight. Looking for convenience and flexibility? This airplane also offers an optional feature of foldable wings, accompanied by a custom-made trailer for easy transportation and storage. This feature allows you to seamlessly transition from the thrill of flying to the convenience of ground transportation. In summary, this high-performance airplane is a rare gem in the aviation world. With its exceptional features, meticulous maintenance history, and attention to safety, it is the perfect choice for any discerning pilot. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this extraordinary aircraft. Contact me today to schedule a viewing or to gather further information. Happy flying!

Engine

Rotax 912 ULS

Condition

Used, built in 2009

Equipment

transponder, radio, rescue system

Contact seller
